title: Formation of oxygen protective layer on monolayer MoS2 via low energy electron irradiation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21999-22005
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03362K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Aissara Rasritat, Manunya Tapakidareekul, Kritsana Saego, Worawat Meevasana, Sorawis Sangtawesin
Monolayer MoS2 surface is modified via low energy electron irradiation, where its photoluminescence intensity can exhibit quenching and recovery behavior in response to the oxygen exposure.
